section: main.h Bu dosyanın dokümantasyonuna git.1 #include "stm32f4xx.h" 2 3 4 /* Exported functions ------------------------------------------------------- */ 5 void TimingDelay_Decrement(void); 6 void initClock(); 7 void initIO(); 8 void delay_ms(uint32_t ms); 9 10 /*bunlari simdilik elle kullaniyom*/ 11 #define _IO volatile // defines rw permissions 12 #define RCC_BASE 0x40023800 13 #define RCC_AHB1ENR (*((_IO uint32_t *)(RCC_BASE + 0x30))) 14 #define GPIOC_BASE 0x40020800 15 #define GPIOC_MODER (*((_IO uint32_t *)(GPIOC_BASE + 0x00))) 16 #define GPIOC_OTYPER (*((_IO uint32_t *)(GPIOC_BASE + 0x04))) 17 #define GPIOC_OSPEEDR (*((_IO uint32_t *)(GPIOC_BASE + 0x08))) 18 #define GPIOC_PUPDR (*((_IO uint32_t *)(GPIOC_BASE + 0x0C))) 19 #define GPIOC_BSRR (*((_IO uint32_t *)(GPIOC_BASE + 0x18))) 20 21 /*systick egitim*/ 22 #define SYSTICK_BASE 0xE000E010 23 #define SYSTICK_CTRL (*((_IO uint32_t *)(SYSTICK_BASE + 0x00))) 24 #define SYSTICK_LOAD (*((_IO uint32_t *)(SYSTICK_BASE + 0x04))) 25 #define SYSTICK_VAL (*((_IO uint32_t *)(SYSTICK_BASE + 0x08))) 26 27 28 #define LED_PIN 13
